about_the_game:
In a world where darkness looms and the unthinkable has become reality, you step into the shoes of the last O5, the final bastion against chaos. SCP: CENTURA TYCOON immerses you in the mysterious world of the SCP Foundation, where you must rebuild and maintain a secretive organization tasked with containing supernatural anomalies, the infamous SCPs.


The Cycle D is nearing its end, and with it, the imminent collapse of the SCP Foundation. Your mission is clear: rise to the challenges that stand before you, rebuild the Foundation, restore security in a world that has grown unstable, and contain the SCPs that have breached their containment cells.

But that's not all. The forces of the Chaos Insurgency, eager to see the SCP Foundation crumble, will stop at nothing to eliminate humanity's last hope against the unknown. You must lead your troops, wisely manage your resources, and conduct in-depth research on the SCPs to develop effective containment methods.

Game Features


- Build and customize your SCP Foundation by constructing high-tech containment facilities and recruiting specialized personnel.

- Explore the complex universe of SCPs by conducting in-depth research to better understand their powers and weaknesses.

- Face varied threats, from the most bizarre SCPs to agents of the Chaos Insurgency, in tactical battles and strategic confrontations.

- Make crucial decisions that will impact the future of your Foundation and the outcome of Cycle D.

- Dive into a captivating storyline filled with mysteries, and shocking revelations.

- Create your own troops to confront different kind of threats.

- Customize the SCPs's confinement rooms


SCP: CENTURA TYCOON will challenge you to make critical decisions for the future of humanity. Are you ready to confront the darkness and rebuild the ultimate line of defense against the unknown? The future rests in your hands. Step into the eerie world of the SCP Foundation today and get ready for an extraordinary game of strategy and management."

And always remember what SCP stand for ; Secure. Contain. Protect.
